body_html:
Yes...Will verify the nsync code on s390x with the commit id you have mentioned.
I guess I need to create a makefile directory also. Earlier, I had used command make depend test. Is that sufficient?
Is there any specific command to build nsync using basel build?
I'll also try building Tensorflow using above commit id (just by making change in workspace.bzl file of Tensorflow) on s390x using basel build command.

body:
Yes...Will verify the nsync code on s390x with the commit id you have mentioned.
I guess I need to create a makefile directory also.   Earlier, I had used command make depend test. Is that sufficient?
Is there any specific command  to build nsync using basel build?
I'll also try building Tensorflow using above commit id (just by making change in workspace.bzl file of Tensorflow) on s390x using basel build command.
